prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

## ATMOSPHERE & MOOD
LIGHTING: Night scene - cool blue moonlight or warm artificial lights, deep shadows, high contrast

## VISUAL CONTINUITY (from previous panel)
This panel continues from the previous panel.

MATCH FROM PREVIOUS PANEL:
- Art style, line weight, coloring technique
- Color palette and lighting direction
- Background style and detail level
- Props/objects: same shape, color, design

CREATE NEW:
- Fresh pose and body position for this action
- New camera angle as specified
- Backpack is worn leather.

## COMPOSITION
- Shot: close-up shot focusing on face and expressions
- Angle: dutch angle (tilted), creates tension or unease
- Location: The Academy Attic (Lily's living quarters. Cramped, chaotic, and magical.) - Visual elements: Lighting: Golden hour dust motes dancing in light beams, Object: Stacks of floating books that form a staircase, Atmosphere: Cozy but claustrophobic, Color Palette: Warm browns, parchment beige, ink black
## CHARACTERS (PRIORITY ORDER FOR APPEARANCE)
1. PREVIOUS PANEL (highest) - If character appeared in previous panel, match that exactly
2. CHARACTER REFERENCE SHEET - Match outfit, hair, accessories, face from reference
3. TEXT DESCRIPTION (lowest) - Only use if not visible in above references

For each character, match appearance in this priority order.
Only change: expression, pose, camera angle as specified below.

**Lily** (MUST match reference image exactly)
  Physical: Petite, messy rose-gold hair tied in a loose side braid. Large, expressive teal eyes behind round, slightly crooked glasses. Always has ink smudges on her cheek.
  - Hair: Rose-gold, messy side braid with loose strands
  - Face: Round slightly crooked glasses, ink smudges on cheek
  - Outfit: Oversized navy blue wizard robe with gold constellation patches
  - Accessory: A battered wooden staff held together with duct tape
  - Footwear: Mismatched brown leather boots
  - Build: Short, constantly tripping or hunched over books
  Expression: panicked
  Position: left of frame
**Ember (formerly Ignis)** (MUST match reference image exactly)
  Physical: A morbidly obese orange tabby cat. His eyes are vertical dragon slits (glowing gold).
  - Body: Fat orange tabby cat
  - Distinctive Feature: Tiny, useless membranous dragon wings on his back
  - Accessory: A red velvet collar with a heavy gold coin pendant
  - Expression: Perpetually unimpressed / half-lidded eyes
  - Movement: Floats slightly when too lazy to walk
  Expression: exhausted
  Position: center of frame

## ACTION & EMOTION
Lily violently stuffs Ember into her leather backpack. Only his annoyed face is visible sticking out of the top flap.

## VISUAL EFFECTS (if appropriate)
- Motion lines for movement
- Speed lines for action
- Sparkles/glow for magical/emotional moments
- Dramatic lighting for tension

## TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- FULL BLEED composition (art to all edges, NO white borders)
- NO text, speech bubbles, or sound effects in image
- Clean professional linework
- Expressive faces with clear emotions
- Dynamic poses with weight and balance
- Rich background detail that supports the mood

panel_data.action: Lily violently stuffs Ember into her leather backpack. Only his annoyed face is visible sticking out of the top flap.
